1. I here by confirm that the information given above is true and correct. I agree that the Bank can use the phone number, email and personal information which I provided above to verify my identity when I register to use the banking services through the online channels. I commit to inform BIDV after arising any changes of my information at the BIDV transaction channels provided. I agree and certify the signature and full name of mine in two below cells is the specimen signature for transactions made from my account at BIDV, replacing my registered signature (if any).

2. I have read, understood and been committed to comply with BIDV's policies and laws of Vietnam in opening, managing, using account including executing transactions on my account and registered services. I take full responsibility for updating any changes of General terms and conditions attached to this Agreement on the website www.bidv.com.vn and/or the other channels of BIDV
Would you like to register BIDV's Online banking services?
I have read and agreed with Terms and Conditons.

1. After registering services, customer can make fund transfer and payment transactions easily with BIDV Online without having to go to the branch, please read carefully the terms and conditions before registering.
2. During the registration process, please do not provide personal information, password or OTP authentication code to anyone to ensure security and confidentiality.
- Notify Credit/Debt transactions on current account/ savings account.
- Alert SMS during nightmode of Corebanking system
- Other information: exchange rate, information about loan…=>please come to the Bank to register services.
Performing transactions anytime, anywhere via internet without going to the bank.
Funds transfer within the territory of Vietnam.
- Customers can select one of those 2 following service packages:
+ Non-financial services: provides with these functions: Inquiries for accounts, Cheque Book, Foreign exchanges rate, and Interest rate.
+ Financial services: provides with inquiries and other financial transactions like fund transfer, Bill payments, online term deposits …
Your transaction limit per day is 100.000.000 vnd. If you want to transaction limit per day more than 100.000.000vnd, Please come to the bank to register BIDV Smart OTP.
A smart mobile banking app that assists customers to bank with BIDV anytime, any where.
- Recharge their prepaid and postpaid phone accounts on ATM or via SMS.
- Purchase prepaid card code via SMS.
- Allows client to top up, purchase card code for themselves or others.
You are a foreigner, Please go to the bank to continue transaction!
You are a non-resident, Please go to the bank to continue transaction!
Tax report according to the United States' laws - Foreign Account Tax Compliance Act
People who are obliged to pay tax under the U.S laws. W9 document needed
People who are not obliged to pay tax under the U.S laws but have one of the following signs relating to the United States. W8-BEN document needed
Are you subject to income tax in the US?
